mapper.select: select * from thread order by threadid asc
mapper.insert: insert into thread(threadid,boardid,subject,posttime,articlenumber,author,lastreply,lastposttime, originid,encodingurl,isvisible) values (#{threadid},#{boardid},#{subject},#{posttime},#{articlenumber},#{author}, #{lastreply},#{lastposttime},#{originid},#{encodingurl},#{isvisible}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE boardid=#{boardid},subject=#{subject},posttime=#{posttime},articlenumber=#{articlenumber}, author=#{author},lastreply=#{lastreply},lastposttime=#{lastposttime},originid=#{originid},encodingurl=#{encodingurl},isvisible=#{isvisible}
mapper.update: update thread,(select article.originid,article.threadid from article, (select threadid,articleid from article where boardid=#{boardid} order by posttime asc) tids where article.articleid=tids.articleid group by tids.threadid) a set thread.originid=a.originid where thread.threadid=a.threadid;
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM thread where boardid=#{boardid} and isvisible=true ORDER BY lastposttime desc limit #{offset},#{limit}
select * from thread where boardid=#{boardid} and originid=#{originid} limit 1
select * from thread where encodingurl=#{encodingurl} and isvisible=true
select thread.encodingurl from thread,article where article.encodingurl=#{encodingurl} and thread.threadid=article.threadid
